title: Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:  "_cudaGetDevice"
body_html:
When building from source, I got this error. My system is OSX 10.12.4, conda 2.7, CUDA 8.0. Any thoughts? Thanks!

[  9%] Linking CXX shared library libTHPP.dylib
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_cudaGetDevice", referenced from:
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
  "_cudaGetDeviceCount", referenced from:
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [libTHPP.1.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

body:
When building from source, I got this error. My system is OSX 10.12.4, conda 2.7, CUDA 8.0. Any thoughts? Thanks!
```
[  9%] Linking CXX shared library libTHPP.dylib
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_cudaGetDevice", referenced from:
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
  "_cudaGetDeviceCount", referenced from:
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
      thpp::THCGenerator::THCGenerator(THCState*) in THCGenerator.cpp.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [libTHPP.1.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THPP.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
